citeinfo.title: Pu`ukohola Heiau National Historic Site Vegetation Mapping Project - Park Boundary

descript.abstract: Land ownership tract boundaries were digitized from National Park Service Land Resources Division maps for Puukohola Heiau National Historic Site. These maps record the authorized boundary of the park as well as the ownership status for individual tracts (or parcels) of land. Ownership tracts are classified as as either federal, or state land. Puukohola Heiau National Historic Site was established in August 1972 and the Lands Division map was last updated in 1995.
descript.purpose: This dataset provides a GIS layer that accurately represents the authorized boundary of Puukohola Heiau National Historic Site, as mapped by the NPS Lands Division.

place.placekey: Puu Kohola Heiau National Historic Site

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.0.1770

attracc.attraccr: Attribute values were checked on-screen and through printouts.

horizpa.horizpar: Shapefile was overlaid with the Land Resources maps and with USGS DRG's and printed at 1:1,500 scale to assess accuracy.

citeinfo.origin: National Park Service, Lands Resources Division, Western Regional Office
citeinfo.title: Segment 101, Puukohola National Historic Site

srcinfo.srccontr: All spatial and attribute information except for GIS acreage calculations.

procstep.procdesc: National Park Service Land Resources Division scanned original maps and provided digital raster files to the GIS Field Technical Support Center (FTSC) in Hawaii. These maps were then georeferenced (in ArcGIS 8.2) to Digital Orthophotoquads.
Land ownership tracts were digitized and corresponding ownership information and tract numbers were recorded in the shapefiles dbf table.

cntorgp.cntorg: Research Cooperation with the University of Hawaii

procstep.procdesc: Shapefiles were converted to coverages and cleaned in ArcInfo to remove slivers and gaps, then exported back to shapefiles.

enttyp.enttypd: Feature class attribute table. Authorized Boundary and Land Ownership Status of Puukohola National Historic Site.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Name of the National Park unit.
2-letter abbreviation of state in which park occurs (or mostly occurs if park spans more than one state)

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Area of feature in internal units squared.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

The information contained in these data is dynamic and may change over time. The data are not better than the original sources from which they were derived. It is the responsibility of the data user to use the data appropriately and consistent within the limitations of geospatial data in general and these data in particular. Any related graphics (if available) are intended to aid the data user in acquiring relevant data; it is not approriate to use the related graphics as data.
The U.S. Geological Survey and the National Park Service gives no warranty, expressed or implied, as to the accuracy, reliability, or completeness of these data. It is strongly recommended that these data are directly acquired from an U.S. Geological Survey and National Park Service servers and not indirectly through other sources which may have changed the data in some way. Although these data have been processed successfully on a computer system at the U.S. Geological Survey, no warranty expressed or implied is made regarding the utility of the data on another system or for general or scientific purposes, nor shall the act of distribution constitute any such warranty. This disclaimer applies both to individual use of the data and aggregate use with other data. It is also strongly recommended that careful attention be paid to the contents of the metadata file associated with these data.
